name: Felted 100% merino wool sweater slippers/boots for Infants, Kids & Youth:  Sandy Night
description:
Slippers/boots are crafted from 100% densely felted up-cycled merino wool sweaters and genuine leather jackets. They are doubled- layered throughout. In addition, they are sturdy, slips on effortlessly and will stay on your baby's feet. They are made with comfort, softness, flexibility and durability in mind. The soft soles and caps are constructed from 100% up-cycled genuine suede leather. The suede leather is soft, flexible and slip resistant, which is suitable for babies and toddlers learning to crawl and walk. 

Delicate Baby Woolies are hand made in the USA in a spoke and pet free environment to keep them fresh and safe for your baby. Careful and precise attention is given to each pair of shoes to make sure that the end results are superb. Please note that all items are unique in nature with slight variations because they are hand made.

Felted sweater slippers/boots can be worn around the house, on short trips to the mall, while cycling or for indoor exercising activities, activities at parks, preschools or at daycare.

Materials used:
-100% up-cycled black merino wool sweater (doubled layered throughout)
- 100% up-cycled brown genuine suede leather
- Inside sole lined with wool
- Slippers/boots are made from 100% recycled materials, making our products earth friendly.

Sole size, quantity & measurement instructions:
4.5 inches (11.4 cm) ----- USA Babies 4.5 (0-12 months) 
5.0 inches (13.0 cm) ----- USA Babies 6.0 (12-24 months) 

5.5 inches (14.0 cm) ----- USA Kids 7.0 
6.0 inches (15.2 cm) ----- USA Kids 8.5  
6.5 inches (16.5 cm) ----- USA Kids 10.0  
7.0 inches (17.8 cm) ----- USA kids 11.5 
7.5 inches (19.1 cm) ----- USA Kids 13.0 

8.25 inches (21.0 cm) ----- USA Youth 2.5 
8.5 inches (21.6 cm) ----- USA Youth 3.0  

Please measure child's foot for accurate measurement (this is very important). Trace foot on a piece of paper with 1/2 inch allowance for flexibility, comfort and growing room.

Benefits of Wool Fibers: 
Unlike synthetic materials, wool is taken from sheep fleece, and is considered to be a natural fiber that is soft, breathable, biodegradable and renewable. It has the amazing ability to absorb up to 30 percent of itâ€™s weight in moisture without ever feeling damp. Another important aspect of wool is that it regulates the body's temperature, which means the wearer feels warm during winter and cool during summer. 

The quality of natural wool sweater slippers/boots offer good support, convenience and ease of use, comfort and protection for kids feet. 

We do accept custom orders on all of our products. If you are interested in a specific size and color that is not listed in our shop, please inform us. We will do our best to meet your needs. Please bear in mind that custom orders have a longer turn around time of 1-2 weeks.

YouTube slide show can be seen at http://youtu.be/K-7qpoxTyt4

Delicate Baby Woolies will donate $2.00 of all sales to Autism Speaks, a national advocacy organization, dedicated to increase awareness, and conducting research studies to prevent and treat individuals impacted by autism.

Thanks for supporting our Eco-friendly store.

name: New and Improved Cashmere baby mukluks/booties.  Eco-friendly: Blue Mountain
description:
Delicate Baby Woolies are handmade in the USA in a smoke and pet free environment to keep them fresh and safe for your baby. Careful and precise attention is given to each pair of shoes to make sure that the end results are superb. We take great pride in crafting high quality foot wear that are comfortable, durable, versatile, flexible, and offer good support and protection for your baby's feet.

We care greatly about your babyâ€™s feet. Therefore, we have taken further steps to improve our cashmere shoe line by re-inventing the way they look, feel and constructed. Our new and improved cashmere boots are double-layered throughout. The upper ankle sections are double-layered with 100% cashmere materials. We have taken a further step by adding an additional layer of felted wool material in the middle of the cashmere. This will allow the boots to still remain soft against your babyâ€™s delicate skin. In addition, they are more sturdy, slip on effortlessly and will stay on your babyâ€™s feet.

We are very confident that you will be very satisfied with our new and improved designs, which set us apart from our competitors. Please note that all items are unique in nature with slight variations, because they are hand made.

Slippers/boots are crafted from 100% densely felted up-cycled cashmere and lambswool sweaters. The soft soles, and caps are constructed from up-cycled genuine suede leather jackets. The suede leather is soft, flexible and slip resistant, which is suitable for babies and toddlers learning to crawl and walk.

Felted sweater slippers/boots can be worn around the house, on short trips to the mall, while cycling or for indoor exercising activities, activities at parks, preschools or at daycare.

Materials used:
- 100% up-cycled blue cashmere sweater (cashmere doubled layered, with wool added in the middle).
- 100% up-cycled dark blue cashmere scarf (doubled layered) 
- dark brown genuine suede leather jacket
- Inside sole lined with wool 
- Slippers/boots are made from 100% recycled materials, making our products earth friendly.

Sole size, quantity & measurement instructions: 
4.5 inches (11.4 cm) ----- USA Babies 4.5 (0-12 months)
5.0 inches (13.0 cm) ----- USA Babies 6.0 (12-24 months) 

Please measure child's foot for accurate measurement (this is very important). Trace foot on a piece of paper with 1/2 inch allowance for flexibility, comfort and growing room.

Benefits of Wool Fibers: Unlike synthetic materials, wool is taken from sheep fleece, and is considered to be a natural fiber that is soft, breathable, biodegradable and renewable. It has the amazing ability to absorb up to 30 percent of its weight in moisture without ever feeling damp. Another important aspect of wool is that it regulates the body's temperature, which means the wearer feels warm during winter and cool during summer.

The quality of natural wool sweater slippers/boots offer good support, comfort and protection for kids feet.

We do accept custom orders on all of our products. If you are interested in a specific size and color that is not listed in our shop, please inform us. We will do our best to meet your needs. Please bear in mind that custom orders have a longer turn around time of 1-2 weeks.

YouTube slide show can be seen at http://youtu.be/K-7qpoxTyt4

Delicate Baby Woolies will donate $2.00 of all sales to Autism Speaks, a national advocacy organization, dedicated to increase awareness, and conducting research studies to prevent and treat individuals impacted by autism.

Thanks for supporting our Eco-friendly store.
